metadata.title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-8-cross package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
